com.opengamma.strata.calc.runner.function

Interface CalculationFunction<T extends CalculationTarget>

    public interface CalculationFunction<T extends CalculationTarget>
    Supertype of all functions that calculate values of measures for a target.

    All functions must be able to specify the data they require to perform their calculations.

    More specific function types can calculate values for one measure or multiple measures, and may rely on the engine to convert values into the reporting currency or handle it themselves.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Optional<Currency> defaultReportingCurrency(T target)
      Returns the default reporting currency for the result of performing the calculation for the target if there is a sensible default.
      FunctionRequirements requirements(T target)
      Returns requirements specifying the market data the function needs to perform its calculations.

    • Method Detail

      • requirements

        FunctionRequirements requirements(T target)
        Returns requirements specifying the market data the function needs to perform its calculations.
        Parameters:
        target - a target
        Returns:
        requirements specifying the market data the function needs to perform its calculations for the target

      • defaultReportingCurrency

        default Optional<Currency> defaultReportingCurrency(T target)
        Returns the default reporting currency for the result of performing the calculation for the target if there is a sensible default.

        This is the currency to which currency amounts are converted if the reporting rules don't specify a reporting currency. This is normally the 'natural' currency for the trade, for example the currency of a FRA or the base currency of an FX forward.

        The default implementation returns an empty optional.

        Parameters:
        target - the target of the calculation
        Returns:
        the default reporting currency for the target if there is a sensible default
